meanings.definition: The animals of a particular region or period considered as a whole.
meanings.sent1: The faunas of the forest include various birds and mammals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the faunas of different ecosystems to understand biodiversity.
meanings.sent3: The faunas at the zoo had a meeting to discuss their favorite foods.
meanings.sent4: The faunas of the ocean danced gracefully in the waves.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the faunas of the jungle felt like stepping into a magical world.

meanings.definition: The animal life of a particular region or period.
meanings.sent1: The diverse faunas of the savannah attract many tourists.
meanings.sent2: Historians study the faunas of ancient civilizations to learn about their environment.
meanings.sent3: The faunas in the pet store had a party to celebrate a new arrival.
meanings.sent4: The faunas of the desert whispered secrets of survival in harsh conditions.
meanings.sent5: Observing the faunas of the Arctic was a breathtaking experience.
